Summary: Stationary star-like object with blinking red/green/white light
divs: Sighting DetailsWent for a walk along my road and over the power lines I saw the only "star" visible because of a cloudy night. Watched for a few minutes and at first I saw a bluefish green lights, then went inside to show my mother and then it was still stationary but with red lights. Watched for a few minutes more and my mother went inside and I proceeded to call my father who lives next door to us and it just kept ringing. I have no idea if it has any connection, but I'm going to go check it out again...be right back...ok that's creepy, me and my mother went back outside and it was still there but skittle lower and we saw clearly a plane headed toward it and then it dissapeared under the treeline....
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brewster
There were no other sightings in Brewster on or around September 30th 2013
